participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and energetic, Emily balances her responsibilities with a love for life and music.
participant_1.background: My biggest fear is that something will happen to my kids. My favorite music is the kind that gets my blood pumping and makes me want to dance. I like to do all my shopping at Walmart. I'm glad that I have enough free time to read again now that my children are grown. I am working on losing weight to improve my health.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Playful and introspective, James enjoys the little things in life and has a unique perspective shaped by his experiences.
participant_2.background: I do not have a car, but I love collecting toys wearing little rain coats with my family. I bought my first journal when I was 12 years old to help me cope with the bullying I was experiencing at school. I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets. I enjoy going to festivals. I am a nurse.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm good, just got done with a long shift at work.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What do you do for work?
That sounds like a tough job. How do you like it?
It's definitely challenging, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm glad to hear that. What's your biggest fear?
That something will happen to my kids.
Oh, that's a very common fear. I'm sure they're very safe with you.
I hope so. I'm glad they're grown up now, so I don't have to worry about them as much.
That's good. What's your favorite kind of music?
I like the kind of music that gets my blood pumping and makes me want to dance.
Me too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorites are probably The Killers, Coldplay, and Mumford & Sons.
I like those bands too! I've seen The Killers in concert a few times.
